description.displayText: I would definitely hire Adelina again and again.  She is dependable, punctual and great with our little kids! Really everything you need in a babysitter.
description.originalText: I would definitely hire Adelina again and again.  She is dependable, punctual and great with our little kids! Really everything you need in a babysitter.

description.displayText:
I highly recommend Addy for any job where you are looking for a responsible, caring, intelligent, flexible, and dedicated employee.  Our Au Pair (delayed by COVID) is now scheduled to arrive soon, so while we would love to have Addy keep taking care of our kids, we need to honor our commitment to the Au Pair program.  We will be very sad to see Addy go.

Addy has helped our family as we have transitioned back and forth from my wife and I working at home or at work and from fully remote 1st grade for our daughter to a hybrid program.  We have great confidence that our kids are safe, happy, and stimulated throughout the day.  She does light housework and is great with our pets.  Addy has brought creative projects for the kids to work on and plays with them all day in a variety of fun and creative ways.  My kids are going to miss her very much.  We have very energetic kids (2, 4, and 6 years old) and Addy makes caring for them look easy.  She is very reliable and is on time every day.
